backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a contact form backend with functions to submit contact messages (name, email, message), retrieve all messages, and query static contact information (email, phone, address).
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend components describing the single-page SCC Classes website structure with header, hero, about, courses, contact sections, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, defining a neutral grayscale palette with warm orange and teal accents.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application from main.tsx into a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles the full page layout with Header, Hero, AboutSection, CoursesSection, ContactSection, and Footer components.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying SCC Classes' mission statement and four feature cards (Expert Instructors, Small Class Sizes, Practical Focus, Career Growth) with icons and a teaching approach description.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with a form to submit inquiries (name, email, message) to the backend and a card displaying contact information (email, phone, address) fetched from the backend API.
frontend/src/components/CoursesSection.t: Courses section displaying six training programs (Programming, Web Dev, Database, Graphic Design, MS Office, Cybersecurity) with icons, descriptions, duration, level badges, and topic lists.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with SCC Classes logo and smooth-scrolling buttons to navigate to Home, About, Courses, and Contact sections.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section featuring a headline, value proposition text, classroom image, and call-to-action buttons that scroll to the contact form and courses section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching contact info and submitting contact forms through the backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a comprehensive design system including light/dark themes, color palettes, spacing, and sidebar styling using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up the React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features for SCC Classes website (homepage, courses, contact, about sections) and pending feature requests to update contact information in the backend.
